description.illuminations.autoUpdater1: Illuminations possess an auto-updater that can allow you to always keep
description.illuminations.autoUpdater2: Illuminations up-to-date without needing you to worry about anything.
description.illuminations.autoUpdater3: It is disabled by default, but you can choose to enable it right here.
description.illuminations.autoUpdater4: Please consider it as it helps support the mod author
description.illuminations.autoUpdater5: as well as always keeping you up to date with the latest update.
description.illuminations.autoUpdater6: This screen will only appear once and won't bother you again.
description.illuminations.autoUpdater7: If you wish to enable or disable the auto-updater after that point,
description.illuminations.autoUpdater8: you can do that at any time by modifying the Illuminations config.
option.tooltip.illuminations.eyesInTheDa: Spooky glowing eyes appearing in low light environments.
ENABLE: Eyes will appear during October
ALWAYS: Eyes will appear no matter the date
option.illuminations.eyesInTheDarkSpawnR: Eyes in the Dark Spawn Rate
option.tooltip.illuminations.eyesInTheDa: The spawn rate of eyes in the dark.
option.tooltip.illuminations.spawnRate.a: This number is affected by the spawn rate multiplier.
option.tooltip.illuminations.spawnRate.n: This number is not affected by the spawn rate multiplier.
option.tooltip.illuminations.willOWispsS: The spawn rate of will o' wisps.
option.tooltip.illuminations.chorusPetal: The spawn rate multiplier of chorus petals.
10x: Multiplies the amount of chorus petals appearing by 10
option.tooltip.illuminations.density: The spawn rate percentage multiplier. Does not affect eyes in the dark.
option.tooltip.illuminations.density.hig: 1000%: Multiplies the amount of illuminations appearing by 10
option.tooltip.illuminations.fireflySpaw: Fireflies spawn every time of day.
option.tooltip.illuminations.autoUpdate: Automatically download and install new versions when they come out.
option.tooltip.illuminations.fireflyWhit: The alpha value of the firefly center glow, in percentage.
option.tooltip.illuminations.viewAurasFP: Whether your own auras and pets should render while in first person
option.tooltip.illuminations.auraSpawnRa: 100%: Spawns aura effect at every interval. This interval is determined by the aura delay
option.tooltip.illuminations.auraDelay.h: 100 ticks: Tries to spawn an aura effect every 5 seconds.
